name: 統計力學（一）
goals: Understand the basic concepts and theories of statistical mechanics
Enhance physics thinking and problem solving skills
syllabus:
Week 1  Review on thermodynamics

Week 2  The statistical basis of thermodynamics

Week 3  Linking entropy to the number accessible microstates

Week 4  Elements of ensemble theory

Week 5  The canonical Ensemble

Week 6   Free energy and partition function

Week 7   Classical ideal gas

Week 8   Midterm exam

Week 9   Energy fluctuations

Week 10  The grand canonical ensemble

Week 11  Formulation of quantum statistics

Week 12 Ideal Bose systems (I)

Week 13 Ideal Bose systems (II)

Week 14 Idea Fermi systems (I)

Week 15 Ideal Fermi systems (II)

Week 16 Final exam
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
